item.title: League of Legends: Wild Rift (@wildrift) on X 🎬
item.description:
Join @PapaSmoothie, John, and @KeSwaab in discovering your Powers Unbound with patch 6.2!
Unleashing on July 17th UTC: 💎New AG system 👊New champions 🐽New Rift changes
